channel.title: Adding working ipban command
channel.description: In a bulby base, how would I create a working IPban command that would instantly after the command is issued ban the player's IP by writing it to banned hosts and would not require a server reboot.

item.title: Adding working ipban command
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

Still doesn’t work

My code:

else if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")){ String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2.rights < 1) { if (p2 != null) { Engine.fileManager.appendData("./data/banned/bannedhosts/" + Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket) + ".txt", "IpBanned"); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just IpBanned " + p2.username); } } else if (p2.rights >= 1) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot ipban staff!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding working ipban command

item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

add this under the ipban method in your command
{
}

PlayerHandler.kickPlayer = true;
